tags.name: simple-blog-overview

`simple-blog-overview`

Attributes:

  * `item-id` {`string`} - ID of this item, this is used for selection UX when back button hit, leave this here

  * `title` {`string`} - Title

  * `body` {`string`} - Body of text

  * `link` {`string`} - Link referencing the page content.

  * `changed` {`number`} - timestamp (unix) of last time changed

  * `elevation` {`number`} - elevation

  * `accent-color` {`string`} - a selected accent-"color": grey, red, pink, purple, etc.

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `selected-page` {`number`} -

  * `dark` {`boolean`} - make the default theme dark?

  * `color` {`string`} - Color class work to apply

  * `contentContainer` - DOM node that wraps the slot

  * `_location` - location as object

  * `responsive-width` {`number`} - width in pixels

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - size for responsive styling: xs, sm, md, lg, xl

  * `sm` {`number`} - Miniumum value for small breakpoint

  * `md` {`number`} - Miniumum value for medium breakpoint

  * `lg` {`number`} - Miniumum value for large breakpoint

  * `xl` {`number`} - Miniumum value for extra-large breakpoint

  * `disable-responsive` {`boolean`} -
